Package models

Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • models.GameState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class GameState
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that represents and holds the data for the GamePlay Contains all the players and the map
